directions: Mix all ingredients in large bowl until well blended. Cover.
Refrigerate 1 hour or until ready to serve. Garnish with additional green onions, if desired.
ingredients: 4 ounces flaked smoked salmon, skin and bones removed
1 cup shredded white Cheddar cheese, divided
1 (1 ounce) package McCormick® Guacamole Seasoning Mix
title: Seattle Smoked Salmon Dip
